declarations.description:
Use cards to display media and text in a compact, appealing way.

```html
<sl-card></sl-card>
```
declarations.name: Card

cssProperties.description: The aspectratio of the media container (default is 4/3). By default this ratio is always maintained, and will cause the media to become smaller when there isn't sufficient space for the full width.
cssProperties.name: --sl-card-media-aspect-ratio

cssProperties.description: The width of the media in relation to the text. Can be set in pixels or `fr`.
cssProperties.name: --sl-card-media-width

cssProperties.description: X-Focuspoint of the media; this is taken as the center when the media is cropped.
cssProperties.name: --sl-card-media-x

cssProperties.description: Y-Focuspoint of the media; this is taken as the center when the media is cropped.
cssProperties.name: --sl-card-media-y

cssProperties.description: When card is smaller than this size it will switch from horizontal (when set) to vertical layout.
cssProperties.name: --sl-card-orientation-breakpoint

cssProperties.description: Set this to 100% when the aspectratio of the media doesn't matter and you want it to fill the full height of the card.
cssProperties.name: --sl-card-stretch-image

cssProperties.description: The width of the text in relation to the media. Can be set in pixels (not recommended) or `fr`.
cssProperties.name: --sl-card-text-width

slots.description: Media, this can be an image or video
slots.name: media

slots.description: Icon button for actions on the card.
slots.name: actions

members.name: explicitHeight
members.description: When the height of the card is set (or constrained) by its container (for example in a grid with fixed rows) this needs to be set to be added in order to assure the correct rendering

members.name: height
members.description: When the height is `fixed` the image will determine the height of the card, when it is `flex` the height of the text will determine the height of the card.

members.name: mediaPosition
members.description: Show the media at the start or at the end.

members.name: orientation
members.description: The position of the media in relation to the text

members.name: padding
members.description: Indicates whether there is a padding around the media. Recommended to set to true when the `--sl-card-stretch-image` isn't set to 100%

attributes.name: padding
attributes.description: Indicates whether there is a padding around the media. Recommended to set to true when the `--sl-card-stretch-image` isn't set to 100%

attributes.name: explicit-height
attributes.description: When the height of the card is set (or constrained) by its container (for example in a grid with fixed rows) this needs to be set to be added in order to assure the correct rendering

attributes.name: height
attributes.description: When the height is `fixed` the image will determine the height of the card, when it is `flex` the height of the text will determine the height of the card.

attributes.name: orientation
attributes.description: The position of the media in relation to the text

attributes.name: media-position
attributes.description: Show the media at the start or at the end.
